pageProduct.name: Vagisil Intimate Wash White Jasmine 240ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Love scents, but have sensitive skin? Vagisil Scentsitive Scents? are here! Gentle scents blended in our specially formulated hypoallergenic & pH balanced wash. For a mild, all-over cleansing experience that your most delicate skin and your senses will love.

2 Gentle Scents

Alluring and long-blooming, white jasmine scent helps you feel fresh all day long. With vitamin E, this wash leaves your skin soft and silky from head to toe. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced.

Delightfully invigorating, this light, fruity scent is both gentle and reviving for a sweet and refreshing shower moment that leaves you feeling clean and confident all day. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced.

One wash for head to toe - and your vulva, too.

80% of women use a regular body wash with fragrance to cleanse all-over - including their vulva. But not all body washes are formulated at the appropriate pH range for the vulvar area. Fact is, all Vagisil? washes are pH balanced at 4.5-5.5 to help maintain a healthy vulvar pH. Tested by board certified Gynaecologist and Dermatologists, these washes have been shown to be gentle enough for your intimate area and all over. So, you can feel good using Vagisil? Scentsitive Scents? as your one-and-only all-over wash.

Tested by docs and trusted by women

For almost 50 years, Vagisil has developed leading intimate care products using empathy and expertise to ensure they address women's needs. Our treatments and daily care products are gynaecologist and dermatologist tested for safety and efficacy. They're made in FDA-registered labs and manufacturing facilities and meet the highest quality standards. We're constantly connecting with consumers who use our products to ensure they're feeling happy, healthy, and satisfied.

General Information

Vagisil Scentsitive Scents White Jasmine Intimate Wash provides a skin-friendly scent for sensitive skin.

An alluring and floral skin-friendly scent for all-day freshness you can take with you.
Because you shouldn't have to choose between a scent and sensitive skin, Scentsitive Scents™ was formulated to smell divine yet be gentle enough for your delicate intimate area. The White Jasmine flower is alluring and long-blooming, so this wash will help you feel-and smell-fresh all day long.

Size: 240mL

KEY FEATURES

• Skin-friendly scent for all-day freshness.
• No dyes, parabens or MIT preservatives
• Hypoallergenic and pH balanced.
• Dermatologist and gynaecologist tested.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse eyes with water. Keep out of reach of children

Ingredients

Water / Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Lauryl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Salicylic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polyquaternium-10, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, Fragrance / Parfum

Directions

Pour into hand or washcloth and apply. Rinse thoroughly.
